summary: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.
cast: Michael J. Fox|Christopher Lloyd|Lea Thompson|Crispin Glover|Thomas F. Wilson|Claudia Wells|Marc McClure|Wendie Jo Sperber|George DiCenzo|Frances Lee McCain|James Tolkan|J.J. Cohen|Casey Siemaszko|Billy Zane|Harry Waters Jr.|Donald Fullilove|Lisa Freeman|Cristen Kauffman|Elsa Raven|Will Hare|Ivy Bethune|Jason Marin|Katherine Britton|Jason Hervey|Maia Brewton|Courtney Gains|Richard L. Duran|Jeff O'Haco|Johnny Green|Jamie Abbott|Norman Alden|Read Morgan|Sachi Parker|Robert Krantz|Gary Riley|Karen Petrasek|George 'Buck' Flower|Tommy Thomas|Granville 'Danny' Young|David Harold Brown|Lloyd L. Tolbert|Paul Hanson|Lee Brownfield|Robert DeLapp|Charles L. Campbell|Kiki Ebsen|Randy Feelgood|Hal Gausman|Deborah Harmon|D'Janine King-Lasky|Huey Lewis|John McCook|Richard Patrick|Tony Pope|Eric Stoltz|Ethel Sway|Tom Tangen|Arthur Tovey|Tom Willett
title: Regreso al futuro
